companyName: Law Office of Link A. Gibbons - Morristown, TN

moreBlocks.practiceAreas: Workers Compensation|Personal Injury|Employment Law|Medical Malpractice|Business Litigation

moreBlocks.articles:
• Workers' Compensation
    We offer free consultations in all workers' compensation claim cases.
  • Personal Injury
    If you have been injured in an accident, we can help you get the benefits and compensation you are entitled to receive.
  • Employment Law
    The Law Office of Link A. Gibbons helps employees and small businesses in a wide range of matters, including claims for retaliation, discrimination, wrongful discharge, unemployment, and overtime violations.
  • Unemployment
    We can help you with your appeal for unemployment benefits.
  • Fair Labor Standards Act (Overtime Pay)
    You may be misclassifed as a salaried employee and entitled to receive back overtime pay for up to three (3) years.

description:
The Law Office of Link A. Gibbons in Morristown, Tennessee, handles a wide range of legal issues for individuals and small businesses throughout East Tennessee. Attorney Link A. Gibbons has been practicing law for nearly a decade and is admitted in all state courts in Tennessee, the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Tennessee and the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Sixth (6th) Circuit. Mr. Gibbons is a member of the Hamblen County Bar Association and the Tennessee Bar Association. He is also a frequent speaker on employment law issues and administrative law.

The Law Office of Link A. Gibbons is one of the few law firms in East Tennessee with the knowledge and experience to aggressively pursue employment law claims (i.e. discrimination, retaliation, wrongful discharge, sexual harassment, overtime violations, etc.) with confidence. Additionally, we also frequently handle workers' compensation claims, unemployment matters, personal injury claims, Tennessee Consumer Protection Act claims and divorce. Attorney Link A. Gibbons has had several successful jury trials and bench trials in these areas of law.

The Law Office of Link A. Gibbons offers free initial consultations for all personal injury and workers' compensation cases. Attorney Link A. Gibbons is also available for evening and weekend appointments. Credit Cards are accepted.
